author: GameSpot
description: Women-Led Games brings recognition to the hard-working women in the games industry with a yearly showcase featuring innovative games coming from women-led and majority-women studios. They aim to highlight all the amazing things women do in games and support their efforts to create a more equitable games industry. Women don’t need to ask for a seat at the table: we’re creating the spaces we want to see.
title: Women-Led Games Showcase: The Game Awards Edition 2025

author: GameSpot
description:
Discover over seventy games from across Latin America in the Latin American Games Showcase – The Game Awards Edition.
Exclusive announcements, world premieres, and a curated lineup highlighting the future of the region’s indie scene.

Live on December 9 — pre-show begins at 3:30 PM PT.
Watch on our channels, as part of The Game Awards’ official broadcast, and through our global co-broadcasters.
title: Latin American Games Showcase - The Game Awards Edition 2025

author: GameSpot
description: The Frosty Mini will premiere on December 10 AEDT / December 9 PT, with exclusive announcements and updates from 20+ games made in Australia and Aotearoa New Zealand!
title: Frosty Mini Showcase 2025 - Games Made in Australia and Aotearoa NZ

author: GameSpot
description:
The final Wholesome Games showcase of 2025, Wholesome Snack: The Game Awards Edition 2025 will premiere on December 9 at 12pm PT / 3pm ET! Get ready for over 20 games, including world premiere announcements and many more surprises you'll see here for the very first time. https://wholesomegames.com 

#indiegames #thegameawards #cozygames
title: Wholesome Snack Showcase - The Game Awards Edition 2025

author: GameSpot
description:
Tune in on Wednesday, December 8th, 2:00 PM PST for a Monster Hunter Showcase!  Capcom will be sharing details on Monster Hunter Wilds Free Title Update 4, and exciting new info on Monster Hunter Stories 3: Twisted Reflection!

In this showcase, Producer Ryozo Tsujimoto will present the latest information on Monster Hunter Stories 3: Twisted Reflection launching March 13, 2026. Details will also be shared on Monster Hunter Wilds Free Title Update 4 arriving December 16!
title: Monster Hunter Showcase - December 2025

author: GameSpot
description:
Kingdom Come: Deliverance II is a 2025 action role-playing game developed by Warhorse Studios and published by Deep Silver. The sequel to Kingdom Come: Deliverance, the game was released for PlayStation 5, Windows, and Xbox Series X/S on 4 February 2025.

#kingdomcomedeliverance2 #kcd2 #gameawards2025
title: Will Kingdom Come Deliverance 2 take home #goty at the 2025 Game Awards?
